banner.title: Transform your <highlight>body</highlight>, transform your <highlight>life</highlight>
banner.subtitle: Discover the power of smart and personalized fitness.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: To be the leading fitness network that empowers individuals to achieve their wellness goals through quality service and advanced technology, guaranteeing a fluid and accessible experience across all our franchises.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To consolidate ourselves as the smartest and most integrated fitness ecosystem in the market, recognized for its operational excellence, strategic data-driven management, and ability to offer scalable and sustainable growth to all our franchisees.

values.title: Values
values.content: Our operation is built upon four fundamental values: Operational Coherence, which ensures standardization in every interaction; Data Integrity, as the basis for strategic decisions; Customer Orientation, focused on lasting relationships; and Technological Agility, to continuously adapt to market demands.

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.content: To transform lives through fitness, creating a community where everyone finds the motivation, equipment, and perfect environment to achieve their physical and mental goals. We are committed to being your ally on this journey of personal growth.

ServicesPage.title: <highlight>OUR</highlight> SERVICES
ServicesPage.subtitle: Explore the variety of classes we offer to help you reach your fitness goals.

BranchesPage.title: <highlight>OUR</highlight> <highlight-dark>BRANCHES</highlight-dark>
BranchesPage.subtitle: Your fitness space, closer than you imagine. Our VITALFIT branches are strategically located to make training accessible, fast, and ensure you never pause your wellness journey.
BranchesPage.footerQuote: Your best version starts here. Visit our branches and feel the energy that transforms. Every VITALFIT space is designed to inspire you, challenge you, and support you every step of your evolution.

FindBranchPage.title: FIND YOUR BRANCH
FindBranchPage.description: Use the map or the search bar to locate our branches

slogan: Transform your life. Reach your full potential.
